public_data.bio: Head of Startups EMEA at OpenAI. Public role includes working with startups, developers, VCs, and accelerators across the region.
posts: OpenAI startup commentary highlights a shift toward technical founders, with technical founders increasingly represented among top AI startup leaders.
Public remarks emphasize direct founder feedback loops to improve platform and product direction.
Visible participation in startup ecosystem events shows ongoing focus on practical AI building and founder support.
differentiators: OpenAI role scope is specifically startups in EMEA.
Public positioning centers on technical founders and startup execution.
Frequently appears in European startup ecosystem programming.

freshness_review.notes: Current evidence items are from 2025 and within the freshness window.

notes: Primary sources support role, region, and startup focus.
One evidence item is a secondary recap and is treated as medium confidence.
